"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55495f5b6368721780b50400#post_55495f5b6368721780b50400
Well Brook's hair is important for a different reason.
[spoiler]When he was still alive, Brook made friends with a baby whale named Laboon. Laboon being the EXACT same whale that Luffy and the crew met when they first entered the Grand Line. And Brook's dream is to meet Laboon again. But because he's a skeleton the only way Laboon wil recognize him is by his signature afro. He's doing it for his friend's sake as much as his own.[/spoiler]
